author: USER
content: Message each other to get work done.

author: Lila
content: Let's make sure we are all on the same page and communicate effectively to get our tasks done.

author: Ethan
content: Absolutely, Lila. Clear communication is key to ensuring we all stay aligned and productive.

author: Lila
content: Thanks, Ethan. Let's set up regular check-ins to keep everyone aligned and address any communication gaps.

author: Ethan
content: Great idea, Lila. Regular check-ins will definitely help us stay on track and address any issues promptly. Let's schedule them.
